nodes.text: "Collector" Kezzit was a male Jawa scavenger who lived in the dangerous region of the planet Tatooine known as the Outlaw's Den during the Cold War. He and the Gamorrean Blearg made camp at the southeastern end of the area, and Kezzit would trade loot that he found in the area.
Kezzit appears as a Black Market vendor in the Outlaw's Den, an open-world PvP zone on Tatooine in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
